actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage + 9 (2d8) necrotic.

actions.name: Raise Corpse
actions.desc: One Humanoid corpse it can see within 30' of it rises as a skeleton or zombie (vetala's choice) under vetala's control.

bonus_actions.name: Command Corpse
bonus_actions.desc: Commands one Undead under its control that it can see to make a weapon attack as reaction. If so has advantage.

reactions.name: Corpse Detonation
reactions.desc: When Undead under its control is reduced to 0 hp vetala can force it to explode. Each creature that isn't Undead or vetala within 5 ft. of exploding Undead: 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage (if zombie) or slashing (if skeleton) damage and 5 (2d4) poison (DC 15 Dex half).

special_abilities.name: Corpse Stride
special_abilities.desc: Once on its turn use 10 ft. of move to step magically into one corpse/Undead within reach and emerge from 2nd within 60' of 1st appearing in unoccupied space within 5 ft. of 2nd.

special_abilities.name: Graveyard Walker
special_abilities.desc: Difficult terrain composed of tombstones grave dirt corpses or other objects or features common to graveyards and necropolises doesn't cost it extra move and it can move through graveyard objects and structures (ex: sarcophagus mausoleum) as if difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force if it ends turn inside object.

special_abilities.name: Master of Undeath
special_abilities.desc: Humanoid it kills or Undead it controls rises in 1 min as skeleton/zombie (vetala's choice) unless Humanoid restored to life or body destroyed. Max 20 total under its control at a time.

special_abilities.name: Shepherd of Death
special_abilities.desc: When an Undead under the vetala's control hits with any weapon the weapon deals an extra 4 (1d8) necrotic.
